alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 7:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Alachua County through 830 PM EDT... At 751 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Archer, or 10 miles west of Gainesville, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua and University Of Florida. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northern Florida.
